attributes.action: Christmas day amnesty from Covid restrictions regarding household visiting.
attributes.additional_details:
We have all went through a tough period over the last 8 months and the worst part of that is not knowing what's coming. Restrictions are lifted and then brought back, no issues with that but we need some light at the end of the tunnel. 
If we could have ONE day with family and friends (one visit only) then it would give us all some hope.
attributes.background: Lift the home visiting restrictions for Christmas day.
